projects.title: Blood donation information
projects.description: The web application for blood donor information in hospitals aims to simplify the search and management of blood donor data. This allows hospitals to track blood availability, speed up the distribution process, and make it easier for donors to participate, thereby increasing the readiness and security of the blood supply.

projects.title: Restaurant
projects.description: The web application for restaurant information aims to make it easier for customers to find restaurants, view menus, find out opening hours, locations, and reviews. With this application, users can make reservations, order food, and get the latest information, increasing customer convenience and satisfaction.

projects.title: Thesis
projects.description: Word2Vec implementation for comparison of Skip-Gram and CBOW in TikTok app reviews aims to analyze the differences in word representation. With Skip-Gram, the model predicts context words based on the center word, while CBOW predicts center words based on the context words, allowing for the evaluation of the depth of meaning in reviews.
